availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: E. P. Davis (Carter County, Kentucky, innkeeper and county and circuit court clerk)

body.p: Carter County, Kentucky, innkeeper and county and circuit court clerk. Virginia native. Married to Matilda Davis. Father of Elizabeth J. Davis, Mary Davis, Richard D. Davis and William D. A. Davis. Innkeeper in Carter County in 1850. County and Circuit Court Clerk in Carter County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, District 2, p. 257A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, p. 262-3.
